_sText:
This is my the non-jail version (NJV) of the surf map surf_bnw, having the same "black and white" theme as it, or like my other map is_bnw. The abbreviation was required as there already is a map named surf_blackandwhite (it has nothing to do with it though). 

It's a single-run surf map with an extra bonus level in the middle of the circuit.

I hope yall like this map, it was a very old project that got abandoned and picked up almost 7 years later... still, it's one of the maps I dedicated my best efforts to finish!

Happy surfin'!
